tool_description: Check DND status of any valid mobile number before sending a SMS/Text Message to India using an up to date database of NDNC, NCCP, TRAI, DNC or NCPR.
name: DND Checker - India
title: DND Checker - India

api_list.name: MOBILE
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dnd.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dnd.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dnd.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dnd.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
